body:
This package can be used to reformat R code: spaces and indent will be added to R code automatically, so that the code will be more human-readable and tidy. This package also provides a GUI (by **gWidgets**) to format R source code.

# Installation

To install from CRAN, use

You can install the [stable version on CRAN](http://cran.r-project.org/package=formatR):

```r
install.packages('formatR')
```

Or use the **devtools** package to install the development version:

```r
library(devtools)
install_github('formatR', 'yihui')
```

# Documentation and Examples

The workhorse in this package is the function `tidy.source()`. See [the Wiki](https://github.com/yihui/formatR/wiki) for usage and [the PDF vignette](http://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/formatR/vignettes/formatR.pdf) for some examples.
